price: 135. Tačiau kai Mes pašalinome jų bausmę nustatytam laikui, kurį jie pasiekė, štai! Jie sulaužė savo žodį!
arabic: فَلَمَّا كَشَفۡنَا عَنۡهُمُ ٱلرِّجۡزَ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ هُم بَٰلِغُوهُ إِذَا هُمۡ يَنكُثُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: falammā kashafnā ʿanhumu al-rij'za ilā ajalin hum bālighūhu idhā hum yankuthūna
